member.name: M:AstroGrep.frmPrint.pdoc_PrintPage(System.Object,System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs)
member.remarks:
PrintPage is the foundational printing event. This event gets fired for every page that will be printed. You could also handle the BeginPrint and EndPrint events for more control.
The following is very fast and useful for plain text as MeasureString calculates the text that can be fitted on an entire page. This is not that useful, however, for formatted text. In that case you would want to have word-level (vs page-level) control, which is more complicated.
